page.title: 02Cound Garage near Cressage
page.content: {Cound Garage}is west along the main road towards{Shrewsbury. The garage provides 3 main services which are: selling cars,selling petrol and accessories and servicing cars. They sell new and second hand cars. The new car that they sell is the {Japanese Subaru. Mr Webb does part exchange which means he buys cars from people and gives them the money so they can buy a more expensive car. Before the cars are sold they are cleaned and serviced. On the forecourt 3,4 and 5 star {petrol}is sold.In the{shop}they sell oil,peat,bodywarmers,drinks and sweets.Apart from Mr Webb and his wife there are 4 mechanics and at least 4 other staff who work at the garage.
